channel.title: Steve Mojica | Blog & Portfolio
channel.description: Thoughts on coding, open-source work, AI, and professional IT life.

item.title: Gateway Crashes, Model Woes, and Going Full Local
item.description: Three separate issues hit on the same day — a rogue cron job crashing the gateway, NVIDIA model limitations, and unrecoverable crashes. All three fixed, now running 100% local on Ollama.

item.title: How I Launched a Full Portfolio Site with Claude Code and Google Antigravity
item.description: 2,566 lines of code, 21 files, 50 commits — a complete React + Vite portfolio deployed on GitHub Pages with Claude AI as my pair programmer. Zero hosting costs, no CS degree required.

item.title: Every Skill We Added to OpenClaw — and Every Wall We Hit Along the Way
item.description: A full breakdown of the skills and capabilities we built into our OpenClaw setup — local model routing, gateway hardening, model fallback chains, cron management, and more — plus every issue we ran into and how we fixed them.

item.title: Mobile SSH Access to Cloud Terminal via Tailscale + Termius
item.description: How I configured full SSH access to my cloud terminal from my phone using Tailscale and Termius — no port forwarding, no exposed ports, just clean mesh networking.

item.title: The Race to Build a Local Agent: Why Claude Blocked OpenClaw and What Comes Next
item.description: Anthropic cut off OpenClaw from using Claude tokens. I think a failed deal and a founder jumping to OpenAI explains everything — and now it is a race to build the definitive local agent.

item.title: My Claude Code Workflow: From Idea to Production
item.description: How I use Claude AI as a force multiplier for development. Real examples of prompts, workflows, and the surprising ways AI has changed how I think about code architecture.

item.title: Running OpenClaw with Local Ollama LLMs (No API Key Required)
item.description: How I configured OpenClaw to run fully local models using Ollama — no cloud dependency, no API keys, full control. Complete step-by-step setup guide included.
